---------------------------
    GLEW Extension Info
---------------------------

GLEW version 2.2.0
Reporting capabilities of pixelformat 7
Running on a AMD Radeon(TM) Graphics from ATI Technologies Inc.
OpenGL version 4.6.14756 Compatibility Profile Context 20.40.28.13 27.20.14028.13002 is supported
